r.s: Manipulate many kinds of password files
r.d: Provides methods to manipulate standard Unix, SMB server, AuthUser (.htpasswd), AuthDigest (.htdigest) and CVS pserver password files.
r.n:
Major changes in File_Passwd_Authbasic: * htpasswd binary isn't needed anymore! * md5 passwords now can be verified * if you want to use sha encryption you must have PHP >= 4.3.0
Introduced constants for encryption modes.
Fixed some bugs and typos.
